message.raw:
Added brute_import, which contains a function that allows inspecting of a module
that has failed to import. This can be useful for diagnosing why it failed
to import and providing potentially more useful error messages.

Modified check_version to use brute_import in the case of a module
failing to import, so that the version may still be checked in the case of a
failed import. This helps determine whether the failed import was due
to a version mismatch or to something else.
